name: humbleimprovements
description: This is a browser extension (currently) for firefox, which enabled different filters for items available on the humbldebundle website and humble store. Filters include: - Steam owned games marking - Steam wishlisted games highlighting - Marking all but selected platform

scripts.build-chrome: npx convert-manifest-format --chrome && web-ext build -a web-ext-chromium && npx convert-manifest-format --firefox
scripts.build-all: npm run-script build && npm run-script build-chrome
scripts.run-chrome: npx convert-manifest-format --chrome && web-ext run -t chromium && npx convert-manifest-format --firefox
